work.name: i.AI for Prime Ministers Delivery Unit, Cabinet Office
highlights: Created and lead an internal consultancy of 10 people
Architecting and prototyping experimental web apps
Providing tech advice to X-Gov development projects
Building sustainably fast-paced practices, and developer-focussed libraries to support them
Team leading and mentoring
Tech used: Python, Django, Docker, CloudFoundry, Gov UK Design System, Postgresql

work.name: Covid Taskforce, Cabinet Office
work.description: Saving the country, one chart at a time
work.summary: Architected and lead development of a Data Science platform for collecting data and rebuilding charts
highlights: Architected and lead development on a system for rebuild charts
Scraped foreign Omicron data and got it onto the PM's desk within hours of asking
Trained and mentored data scientists in software engineering best practices
Tech used: Python, Pandas, Django, Celery, Docker, Postgresql, Scrapy, AWS

work.name: Institute for Apprenticeships
work.description: Refactoring a large system built by non-developers
highlights: Refactored internal data science platform
Trained and mentored data scientists in software engineering best practices
Implemented agile development practices
Tech used: Python, Pandas, Django, Azure, Docker, Postgresql

work.name: Boston Consulting Group Digital Ventures / De Beers
work.description: Ethical artisanal diamond mining tracking app
highlights: Architected and built a system for handling asynchronous data from an offline first mobile application deployed to artisanal diamond miners in Africa
Built and supported backend app to receive data, handle buying of diamonds, and put data onto a sister blockchain app
Tech used: Python, GraphQL, Docker, CircleCI, Heroku, Azure, AWS

work.name: Department of International Trade
highlights: Worked on data collection project; engineering a data transformation and syncing service
Built website, and integrated with data-science platform, and UN Comtrade Data and WorldBank Data
Lead on 'dockerisation' of other websites
Tech used: Python, Docker, Pandas, Behave, Scrapy, Postgres, Redis, Jade, AWS

work.name: Hitachi Consulting
highlights: Architected and developed a prototype energy trading platform, including algorithmic price predictions and energy balancing
Docker based micro-service deployment
Architected and developed a data science platform for parallel, distributed simulations of the platform against historical data
Architected and developed market simulator API to imitate market based on historical data
Lead on architecture, quality and mentoring
Tech used: Python, Docker, Django, Falcon, SQLAlchemy, Pandas, PuLP, Celery, RabbitMQ, Ansible, Fabric, BDD, PostgreSQL, Redis, Jenkins

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Won award at AIHacks 2016
Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
